title: ISIS Claims Responsibility for Attack in Bangladesh Targeting Shias
text:
ISIS Claims Responsibility for Attack in Bangladesh Targeting Shias 
Published By: NYTimes - Today 
The explosions Saturday morning during a procession in the capital were the third act of violence that an Islamic State account has claimed ...
